channel.title: Articles on Arthur Knowledge Base
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Arthur Knowledge Base

item.title: Create a TF2 server
item.description: TF2 is a fun game I’d like people to play on. Unfortunately, it’s not as easy to set up a TF2 server (compared to, IE, a minecraft server), but I did the work for you with this tutorial :).

item.title: Display a traceroute on a map
item.description: To display a traceroute graphically on a map, it is possible to use the excellent traceroute mapper by pasting the output of the traceroute command to it, but it is also possible to use the following command to open the web page directly from the terminal.

item.title: Open ports and get a static IP over a 4G router
item.description: Article not yet available in english :(
